member.name: M:Website.Controllers.AccountController.Register(Website.Models.Account)
member.summary: This allows you to register an account on Automated.ML

member.name: M:Website.Controllers.AccountController.Login(Website.Models.Account)
member.summary: This allows you to login to an account on Automated.ML It returns the JWT token that should be used on autorized requests.

member.name: M:Website.Controllers.ModelFieldController.GetModelFields(System.Int32)
member.summary: This gets all the model input/output items for a specific model.

member.name: M:Website.Controllers.ModelsController.GetTopTen
member.summary: This gets the top 10 models by votes.

member.name: M:Website.Controllers.ModelsController.SearchModel(System.String)
member.summary: This searches for models based on title.

member.name: M:Website.Controllers.ModelsController.GetModel(System.Int32)
member.summary: This gets the entire model object with the modelId

member.name: M:Website.Controllers.ModelsController.VoteForModel(System.Int32)
member.summary: [Requires Auth] This allows the user to vote for a model.

member.name: M:Website.Controllers.ModelsController.HasVotedForModel(System.Int32)
member.summary: [Requires Auth] This checks if the user has voted for a model already

member.name: M:Website.Controllers.ModelsController.GetModelVotes(System.Int32)
member.summary: This gets the total number of model votes

member.name: M:Website.Controllers.ModelsController.StartTraining(Website.Models.TrainInput)
member.summary: [Requires Auth] This trains a new model with the TrainInput parameter

member.name: M:Website.Controllers.ModelsController.GetPrediction(Website.Models.PredictionInput)
member.summary: [Requires Auth] This makes a prediction on an already existing model
